title: Universe/Frames/PointLagrange
description: Configuration for PointLagrange points in frames plugin (Lagrangian points L1 through L5 for given primary and secondary bodies)

primary.description: Name of point in the universe to be used as primary

secondary.description: Name of point in the universe to be used as secondary

primaryGM.description: Name of constant in the universe to be used as primary body GM

secondaryGM.description: Name of constant in the universe to be used as secondary body GM

type.description: Type of Lagrange point, L1 through L5
